definition: to deposit; by implication, to allow to stay
kjvTranslation: bestow, cast down, lay (down, up), leave (off), let alone (remain), pacify, place, put, set (down), suffer, withdraw, withhold. (The Hiphil forms with the dagesh are here referred to, in accordance with the older grammarians; but if any distinction of the kind is to be made, these should rather be referred to H5117 (נוּחַ), and the others here.)

translations.bg: да депозирам; по подразбиране - да позволя да остане
translations.da: at deponere; underforstået, at lade forblive
translations.de: zu hinterlegen; implizit, zuzulassen, dass sie bleiben
translations.el: να καταθέσετε- να επιτρέψετε την παραμονή, κατ' επέκταση
translations.es: depositar; implícitamente, permitir que se quede
translations.fr: déposer ; par implication, permettre de rester
translations.hu: letétbe helyezni; értelemszerűen hagyni, hogy ott maradjon
translations.id: untuk menyimpan; dengan implikasi, untuk mengizinkan untuk tinggal
translations.it: depositare; per implicazione, permettere di rimanere
translations.nb: å deponere; underforstått, å tillate å bli værende
translations.nl: deponeren; impliciet, toestaan om te blijven
translations.ro: a depune; implicit, a permite să rămână
translations.ru: сдавать на хранение; по смыслу, позволять оставаться
translations.sv: att deponera; underförstått, att låta stanna
translations.tr: yatırmak; ima yoluyla, kalmasına izin vermek
translations.uk: вносити на депозит; непрямо - дозволяти залишатися
